sentences.en: Be sure of it; give me the ocular proof.
sentences.cn: 相信它; 给我可见的证据.

sentences.en: High elasticity facilitates capsulotomy and affords ocular protection against high - frequency mechanical insults.
sentences.cn: 高弹性特征可易化撕囊难度和提供机械震动的吸收.

sentences.en: In both instruments, the image formed by an objective is viewed through an ocular.
sentences.cn: 在这两种仪器中, 物镜所成的象都是通过目镜来观看的.

sentences.en: Objective To determine the permeability of prolonium iodide through blood - ocular barrier.
sentences.cn: 目的确定普罗碘铵通过血 - 眼屏障的能力.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate ocular contusion by fundus fluorescein angiography.
sentences.cn: 目的分析眼挫伤眼底改变及眼底荧光血管造影的表现.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the diagnostic value of B - mode ultrasound in ocular injury.
sentences.cn: 目的评价B超检查眼外伤的诊断价值.

sentences.en: Report a case of siderosis bulb without definite ocular injury history.
sentences.cn: 报告一无明显外伤史之眼球铁质沈着症病例.

sentences.en: Report a case of siderosis bulbi without definite ocular injury history.
sentences.cn: 摘要报告一无明显外伤史之眼球铁质沈着症病例.

sentences.en: The first is a handful of ocular diseases like pigmentary glaucoma.
sentences.cn: 首先,改变眼部黑色素的是眼部疾病,如青光眼(患者瞳孔内出现青绿色的反光).

sentences.en: The Huygens ocular , which dates back over 250 years is still in wide use today.
sentences.cn: 二百五十多年前的惠更斯目镜今天还在广泛使用.

sentences.en: The mechanism of corticosteroid - induced ocular hypertension is increased aqueous outflow resistance.
sentences.cn: 类固醇诱导性高眼压的发生机制是房水流出阻力的增加.

sentences.en: The ocular axial length and refractive degree were stable after operation.
sentences.cn: 患者的眼轴和屈光度数稳定.

sentences.en: The ocular defects made him lose the chance for the job.
sentences.cn: 视力缺陷让他失去了这个工作的机会。

sentences.en: With atropine, ocular effects are accompanied by tachycardia.
sentences.cn: 用阿托品则产生眼效应,并伴有心率加快.

sentences.en: With ocular ultrasound examination , it was demonstrated to be a cystic - like lesion.
sentences.cn: 经手术切除,组织病理证实为毛囊细胞瘤.

trans.tran_cn: 眼睛的，适于眼睛的，用眼的，视觉的
trans.tran_en: relating to your eyes or your ability to see
